alert.note: Alert for Mountains Of San Benito County And Interior Monterey County Including Pinnacles National Monument; Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 12:56PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern San Benito and northwestern Monterey Counties through 130 PM PST... At 1256 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Salinas, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salinas, Ridgemark and Prunedale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Mountains Of San Benito County And Interior Monterey County Including Pinnacles National Monument; Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley
